CustomField.description: A unique string that Stripe uses as the Transfer Group name. Blackthorn recommends using this Transaction parent's Salesforce record ID as the unique ID. Populate it with a trigger, flow, process builder, or similar, on the creation of the record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A unique string that Stripe uses as the Transfer Group name. Blackthorn recommends using this Transaction parent's Salesforce record ID as the unique ID. Populate it with a trigger, flow, process builder, or similar, on the creation of the record.
CustomField.label: Transfer Group ID
